title: Patch 6.14 is out

embed.description: R reduces QWE cooldowns instead of amplifying auras. A bunch of other stuff. Trust us, just read this one. Things have been quiet for Sona over the past few seasons, so the sheer volume of changes here may look intimidating. In actuality, they all lead to one simple outcome: "Sona plays more music."

body:
Patch 6.14 is now live in OCE. If you discover any issues or bugs after patching please post here and we'll get right on it.

Have fun and see you on Summoners Rift :)

Cheers!
Mindstar

replies.body:
**Its not a bug**_ (and thats the problem)_

Taliyah's new casting on W, is so frustrating to use. Especially on smartcast!
The old system worked just fine, why change?

The new vector casting makes it feel slower and also harder to judge the size/direction of the particle, the mouse movements on it now feel weird in combination with her other abilities.

I have played Taliyah pretty much non stop since she came out, I'm lvl 7 mastery and she has passed almost all of my other champs in points, so In my opinion i know her quite well, and i believe this a step in the wrong direction for quality of play for her.

Also (on smart cast at least) its nearly impossible to make it knock up without throng in a direction, which is incredibly frustrating if youre trying to hold them in place for an ashe arrow or something of the like)

If theres enough community feedback about it, could you please at least consider looking to change it back?

>The old system worked just fine, why change?

It really didn't, it was clunky as hell, and coming from someone who has taken the time to get used to vector casting on other champions, it's a change that was basically required, and hell should have been put out on release.

As for the Ashe Arrow sort of thing, throw them into the Arrow, not straight up.

It takes time, but you will get used to it, and once you do, you will find it is way better.

A little clunky is okay when the champion's theme is 'Rocks'

Well ill give it a fair try. I suppose I rage-posted after only playing it a few times.

I guess you're right, time will tell.

It was actually changed because of community feedback. Mainly high elo and Reddit communities were very insistent that vector cast was better. 

**Riot Zenon** wrote up an [in-depth explanation](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/1bunGEHs-taliyah-changes-for-614) as to why they decided to change it. With any luck you might find a few answers to your questions there.
No Tibbers delay fix? Come on.

i read over the {{champion:89}}  "buffs" and found this to be a sad joke riot claims to have buffed her by reducing the cd on her q slightly and added the extra bit to her passive . but then you read the rest and she has had every damage output nerfed . so you guys didn't buff her you tweaked her then nerfed her as with all the downgrade in stats far out shine the supposed "buffs" .
